snippet: Shares of the animal health company declined 6.5 percent after its 2014 forecast fell short of Wall Street expectations.
abstract: Shares of animal health company Zoetis decline 6.5 percent after its 2014 forecast fell short of Wall Street expectations; company says it expects to earn $1.48 to $1.54 a share this year, on $4.65 billion to $4.75 billion in revenue.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the animal health company declined 6.5 percent after its 2014 forecast fell short of Wall Street expectations.

headline.main: Zoetis Reverses Loss, but Its Forecast Disappoints
headline.print_headline: Zoetis Reverses Loss, but Its Forecast Disappoints
